name: Strike While the Iron is Hot
name_original: Strike While the Iron is Hot
description:
Welcome to the Mountainhome, Migrant. We have a job for you.

The Manager has requested a standing order of goblets, but we are still cleaning our previous Metalsmith off of the dining hall floor. We need you to accept a new Labor and man the Workshop immediately. Ask a Hauler if you run out of Iron Bars or Bituminous Coal.

Good luck. I'm sure you'll be a Master Metalsmith in no time!
